text.section: The fiscal year for each county, municipal corporation, and special taxing district in the State begins on July 1 of a calendar year and ends on June 30 of the next calendar year.

Each county, municipal corporation, and special taxing district shall use the fiscal year for:
Appropriating money;
Authorizing expenditures; and
Balancing books and accounts.
